condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.1: A well-coordinated and capacitated child protection system with three integrated components: a child-friendly justice system, a gender responsive social welfare system, and a functioning birth registration system

description.narrative: A coordinated child protection system is functional with a child-friendly justice system, a gender-responsive social welfare system and electronic birth registration in 44 sites and 20 health facilities benefiting a population of 3 million people. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/01/2020
